title: Tombstoning
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: He really hated the fucking festival. They reached the bottom of Livingstone Place and stood kind of awkwardly loitering, like they were at the end of a first date.

title: Tombstoning
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: 'Livingstone Place, just across the Meadows. It's one street along from our own flat, in Gladstone Terrace.'
